tuv.seg: Case study: Redundancy payment and short-time working
Cás-Staidéar ar íocaíocht iomarcaíochta agus obair ghearr-ama
Mary has worked for the same employer for the past 15 years
D'oibrigh Mary don fhostóir céanna le 15 bliana anuas
Two years ago she was put on a three-day week on the understanding that this was temporary and that full-time work would be resumed
Cuireadh ar sheachtain trí lá í dhá bhliain ó shin ar an tuiscint go mbeadh obair lánaimseartha atosaithe
She has now been told however that she is to be made redundant
Cibé ar bith, tá sé ráite léi anois go ndéanfar iomarcach í
Over the years she has never received a pay increase
Le linn na mblianta, ní bhfuair sí ardú pá riamh
How will her redundancy payment be calculated?
Cén chaoi a ndéanfar a híocaíocht a mheas?
Mary would be entitled to two weeks' pay for each year of service plus one extra week's pay
Bheadh Mary i dteideal dhá sheachtain phá do gach bliain seirbhíse móide seachtain phá sa bhreis
The present ceiling (since 1 January 2005) on earnings is €600 per week (previously €507 per week)
Is é an t-uasteorainn reatha (ó 1 Eanáir 2005) ar thuillimh ná €600 in aghaidh na seachtaine ( €507 in aghaidh na seachtaine roimhe sin)
The payment would normally be calculated on her earnings at the time she is let go
Bheadh an íocaíocht ríofa go hiondúil bunaithe ar a tuillimh nuair a dhéanadh í a dhífhostú
She had been working full-time for 13 years however before being put on reduced working hours
Cibé ar bith, bhí sí ag obair lánaimseartha ar feadh 13 bliana roimh ar cuireadh ar uaireanta oibre laghdaithe í
That is, a three-day week
'Sé sin, seachtain trí lá
If she was made redundant within one year of being put on reduced hours, her redundancy payment would be based on her earnings for a full week
Más rud é go ndearnadh iomarcach í laistigh de bhliain amháin ó bheith curtha ar uaireanta laghdaithe, bheadh a híocaíocht iomarcaíochta bunaithe ar a cuid tuillimh do sheachtain iomlán
In this case she is being made redundant having been on a three-day week for more than a year
Sa chás seo, tá sí á déanamh iomarcach tar éis a bheith ar sheachtain trí lá níos faide ná bliain
How her payment will be calculated depends on whether she accepted being on reduced hours or not
Tá an bealach ina measfar a híocaíocht ag brath ar cibé ar ghlac nó nár ghlac sí le bheith ar na huaireanta laghdaithe

If she fully accepted the reduced working hours as her normal week and never asked to return to full-time work, then her redundancy payment will be based on her gross pay for the reduced working hours

Má ghlac sí go hiomlán lena huaireanta oibre laghdaithe mar ghnáthsheachtain agus nár iarr sí riamh filleadh ar obair lánaimseartha, beidh a híocaíocht iomarcaíochta mar sin bunaithe ar a ollphá do na huaireanta oibre laghdaithe

If, on the other hand, she never accepted the reduced working hours as her normal hours and continually asked to be put back on full-time working, then it is clear she did not accept her reduced working hours as normal

Ar an láimh eile, murar ghlac sí riamh leis na huaireanta oibre laghdaithe mar a gnáth uaireanta agus gur iarr sí go leanúnach a bheith curtha ar ais ag obair go lánaimseartha, tá sé soiléir mar sin nár ghlac sí leis na huaireanta oibre laghdaithe mar a gnáthuaireanta
In this situation, her redundancy payment should be calculated based on her full-time rate of pay
Sa chás seo, ba chóir go mbeadh a híocaíocht iomarcaíochta ríofa, bunaithe ar a ráta lánaimseartha pá
If she had asked to be placed on reduced working hours for her own reasons and the employer agreed, then the redundancy entitlement would based on the reduced hours
Más rud é go ndearna sí iarratas a bheith curtha ar uaireanta oibre laghdaithe agus gur aontaigh an fostóir leis, beidh an teidlíocht iomarcaíochta bunaithe ar na huaireanta laghdaithe mar sin
If she has a dispute about this with her employer she could make a claim to the Workplace Relations Commission using the online complaint form available on workplacerelations.ie

Má tá aighneas aici faoin méid seo lena fostóir is féidir léi éileamh a dhéanamh ar an gCoimisiún um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre tríd an fhoirm ghearáin ar líne nua a úsáid á fáil ar workplacerelations.ie
